column1: 1,Complete Purchase for Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra Case,"Navigate to the homepage, select a Samsung case, adjust quantity, and proceed through the checkout process by entering shipping details. Verify the thank you page.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 3: Click on link brand (Samsung) -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Click on link SamsungGalaxyS23UltraSmartviewCases -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 7: Click on link GoToCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 9: Proceed to checkout and enter email for shipping

column2: - Step 1: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
- Step 4: Enter input value in input Email

column1: Step 13: Enter input value in input FirstName
Step 16: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 19: Enter input value in input Address
Step 22: Enter input value in input ZipCode
Step 25: Enter input value in input City
Step 28: Enter input value in input State
Step 30: Enter input value in input Phone
Step 31: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
Step 32: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
Step 33: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
